Entries.Tue6: Hey, @.$0#$b#Do you happen to know what Penny might like as a gift?$4#$e#Oh, don't get me wrong.$8#$b#I justwanted to thank her for being so nice to Vincent.$10
Entries.Thu6: I don't really enjoy reading.$0#$b#But Penny makes it sound so interesting... maybe I should give it a chance.$1
Entries.Fri6: I wonder what Penny is doing right now...$0#$e#Huh? Oh, I didn't see you, @.$0#$b#How's it going?$1
Entries.Sat6: Hey, @!$1#$b#Will I see you in the saloon later?$0#$e#Do you think Penny would like to join us?$0

Entries.Mon6: Hello, @. Do you grow cactus on your farm?$0#$e#...Huh? Nevermind, I was just asking.$4
Entries.Wed6: Yesterday I ran into Sebastian and Abigail and we actually chatted for a while.$0#$b#I think Sam has helped me to come out of my shell.$1
Entries.Fri6: I was thinking of taking Vincent and Jas on a field trip someday.$1#$b#Do you think Sam would like to come?$4#$e#I-I mean, since Vincent really looks up to him I thought it would be good for both of them.$4
Entries.Sat6: I've heard that Sam usually goes to the saloon with his friends.$3#$e#I almost never go but...$3#$b#...maybe I should from now on.$4

Entries.Mon2: Do you get along with Penny?$0#$e#She's actually pretty cool!$1
Entries.Sat2: Lately I haven't been able to compose any good songs.$2#$b#Luckily, Penny recommended me a book that has served as inspiration.$1

Entries.Thu2: Did you know that Sam likes Paradise Horizon?$1#$e#Oh... You don't know what that is...$2
Entries.Sat2: The passion that Sam puts into making music is truly impressive.$0#$b#I admire him for that.$1

Entries.Wed4: Have you seen Penny?$0#$e#I wanted her to recommend me another book on music.$0
Entries.Thu4: Penny and I are really similar in many ways?$0#$e#It was a surprise for me too!$1
Entries.Fri4: Lately I've been spending more time with Penny.$0#$b#She's really cool once you get to know her!$1

Entries.Mon4: Uhm... Have you seen Sam by any chance, @?$3#$e#Oh, it’s nothing like that.$0#$b#I just want to talk about how Vincent is doing.$3
Entries.Fri4: I hope Sam gets to give his own concert someday.$0
Entries.Sun4: The other day Sam showed me a new song he's composing.$0#$b#It was really good!$1

Entries.Mon8: You know, I'm relieved that Penny made the first move.$1#$e#Sebastian used to tell me that I would never be able to ask her out.$0#$b#Guess he was right.$10
Entries.Wed8: It's nice that Vincent likes Penny so much.$1#$b#But obviously I love her more!$4
Entries.Thu8: Pam may be overprotective with Penny.$0#$b#But that shows how much she cherishes her.$0
Entries.Fri8: At first Pam disapproved my relationship with Penny.$2#$b#But I'm glad I was able to show her I'm serious about Penny.$1
Entries.Sat8: Penny is so nice to my mother, I think that I love her more day by day.$4
Entries.Sun8: I knew Penny was the one the very first moment I met her.$4#$b#I was just too nervous to approach her first.$10
Entries.spring_Mon8: I feel like the luckiest person alive with Penny by my side.$4
Entries.spring_Wed8: This might sound weird to you but...$0#$b#I always miss Penny even when I have just seen her.$4
Entries.spring_Thu8: I can't even imagine how my life was before Penny.$4#$e#She's so important to me...$4
Entries.summer_Wed8: Sometimes I feel like I should be more open with Penny about how much I care about her...$2
Entries.summer_Sat8: Penny and I took Vincent and Jas to the park the other day.$0#$e#They started arguing over some small thing.$2#$b#Her job sure is hard sometimes.$0
Entries.summer_Sun8: Seb thinks that Penny is really cool.$0#$b#I'm glad that my two best friends get along.$1
Entries.fall_Mon8: Do you think I would be a good parent, @?$7#$e#Penny sure would be.$1
Entries.fall_Thu8: Penny has made me realise that I wasn't spending enough time with Vincent.$0#$b#You know, he'll be grown up soon.$0
Entries.fall_Fri8: Penny is going to have dinner with us tonight.$0#$b#I'm so excited!$1
Entries.winter_Tue8: My mother absolutely loves Penny.$1#$b#She's just the perfect girlfriend and would be a great daughter-in-law.$0
Entries.winter_Wed8: It's crazy how much I enjoy the time I spend with Penny...$4#$b#So this is what being in love feels like?$10
Entries.winter_Fri8: What kind of song do you think Penny would like the most?$1#$e#I wanted to make something special for her.$10
Entries.winter_Sun8: I'm looking forward to spending more time with Penny next year.$4

Entries.Tue8: I wonder what Sam is doing right now...$4#$e#We do see each other a lot, but I still miss him everyday.$0
Entries.Wed8: Since Sam and I started dating, Vincent hasn't stop asking us all kinds of questions.$0#$e#It's kind of embarrassing sometimes...$2
Entries.Thu8: I'm glad Vincent is Sam's little brother.$0#$b#It means I can spend even more time with Sam!$1
Entries.Fri8: Mom has probably been more lonely now that I'm spending more time with Sam.$2#$b#I just hope she has not started going to the saloon more often.$2
Entries.Sat8: I was nervous about how Sam's parents were going to react to our relationship...$3#$e#But they're both really nice to me!$1
Entries.Sun8: Sam gave me an idea about a musical activity for Jas and Vincent.$0#$b#They are going to love it!$1
Entries.spring_Mon8: I feel so proud of Sam whenever he shows me a new song that he has composed.$0#$b#If he's happy, I'm happy.$4
Entries.spring_Thu8: ...I still can't believe I'm dating the most wonderful man in the world.$4#$e#To be honest, I don't even know how I had the courage to ask him out first.$0
Entries.spring_Fri8: I'm not fond of the saloon for obvious reasons.$5#$b#But Sam likes to go there with Abigail and Sebastian, so I join him occasionally.$0
Entries.summer_Tue8: As I'm a teacher, I usually wake up early to arrive at the museum first.$0#$b#On the other hand, Sam is just the opposite, he loves to sleep.$0
Entries.summer_Wed8: When I would read romance novels I never thought that something similar would happen to me...$4#$e#Sam makes me feel like I'm the only woman in the world.$4
Entries.summer_Sat8: When Sam and I can't fall asleep, we meet each other at night to look up at the stars.$0#$e#Maru told us where was the best place to go stargazing.
Entries.fall_Mon8: Sebastian and Sam like to play Solarian Chronicles.$0#$e#They asked me if I wanted to join, but I think I'll just watch for now.$0
Entries.fall_Thu8: Isn't Stardew Valley the perfect place to raise kids?$0#$e#Of course, not now. Sam and I are still young.$1
Entries.fall_Sun8: I never dated anyone before Sam, so I was really nervous.$0#$e#Fortunately it all feels natural with him.$4
Entries.winter_Fri8: I'm looking forward to my future with Sam...$4#$b#Have you ever felt this way, @?
Entries.winter_Sat8: Do you think Sam would like to get married someday, @?$4#$e#I surely do...$4
Entries.winter_Sun8: I can't stop thinking about Sam.$4#$e#I just love him so much...$4

Entries.Mon2: Hey, kid. Penny told me that she started dating Sam.$4#$b#I hope he treats my baby girl well.$4#$b#... Or he’ll have to deal with me.$4
Entries.Mon10: Hi, kid.$0#$e#I've been thinking 'bout buying something nice for Penny and Sam.$0#b#If only I could afford it...$2
Entries.Tue4: Penny is really happy these days.$0#$b#Guess my little talk with Sam has paid off.$1
Entries.Tue6: Looks like Penny has found a fine lookin' young man.$0
Entries.Wed8: It's so lonely at home these days...$2#$b#Well, at least my little girl seems to be enjoying herself.$0
Entries.Thu2: Sam better be treatin' Penny right and not be like that that ex-husband o' mine.$4
Entries.Fri6: Maybe Sam is a good guy after all.$0#$b#I just don't want Penny getting hurt.$2
Entries.Fri10: Hi there, farmer.$0#$e#Jodi and me ain't got similar tastes.$0#$b#But we're family now!$1
Entries.Sat8: Hey, kid.$1#$b#Penny seems to have long term plans with Sam. He better treat her well!$1
Entries.Sun10: You know, Penny's father abandoned us when she was little.$2#$e#I'm pleased that she grew up fine and found herself a decent man like Sam.

Entries.Mon2: Miss Penny gave me a haircut.$1#$e#She also gave my brother a haircut.$1
Entries.Mon6: I saw Miss Penny with my brother at the beach yesterday.$3#$b#They were hugging each other.$3#$e#It is normal for grown-ups to do that?$3
Entries.Tue6: My brother told me that he was going to marry Miss Penny someday.$2#$b#That's not fair, I wanted to marry her first!$2
Entries.Tue8: I saw my brother trying to cook a poppyseed muffin earlier.$3#$b#Maybe he is going to give it to Miss Penny.$0#$e#But I don't think it'll taste good.$3
Entries.Wed4: I asked Miss Penny about my brother.$3#$e#Her face turned red like a tomato!$1
Entries.Wed8: Maybe it would be cool if Sam and Miss Penny get married.$3#$b#We would spend more time together!$1
Entries.Thu6: I heard my brother playing a new song.$0#$b#He told me it was a song for Miss Penny.$1
Entries.Thu8: I think mom really likes Miss Penny.$1#$e#I do, too!$1
Entries.Fri2: Miss Penny told me that my brother will become a rock star someday.$1
Entries.Fri10: My brother has changed a lot. He's nicer to me these days.$1#$e#Maybe Miss Penny told him to...?$3
Entries.Sat2: My brother sometimes comes with me to the museum.$0#$e#I think it's because he wants to see Miss Penny.$3
Entries.Sat8: Miss Penny came to our house the other day.$0#$b#I thought she wanted to play with me, but she went to my brother's room.$2
Entries.Sat10: Mister @, do you think Miss Penny and my brother are in love?^Miss @, do you think Miss Penny and my brother are in love?$3
Entries.Sun8: Do you know how to make bracelets?$3#$e#I want make a gift for Miss Penny and my brother.$0
Entries.Sun10: Last night Miss Penny came to have dinner with us.$1#$b#I'm so happy that my brother and her are good friends!$1

Entries.Mon4: Sam was just a child when I left...$0#$b#... And now he even has a girlfriend.$1
Entries.Mon6: When I came back, Jodi told me that Penny was Vincent's teacher.$0#$b#... I guess that's how she and Sam grew close.$2
Entries.Tue4: Sometimes I ask Penny about Sam's life.$2#$b#It's sad...$2
Entries.Wed2: Was Penny already living here when I left?$2#$e#I can't remember...$2
Entries.Wed8: Sometimes it's difficult not to think of Sam as the little kid he was when I left.$0#$b#I would have never imagined that he would have a girlfriend so soon.$0
Entries.Thu2: So Sam has found a girlfriend...$2#$b#Her name was Penny?$2
Entries.Thu10: I hope I'm a good father-in-law to Penny.$1
Entries.Fri8: Seeing Sam with wedding plans makes me feel so surprised.$0#$e#...In a good way.$1
Entries.Fri10: I'm actually hoping that Sam and Penny have kids sooner rather than later.$1#$b#Since I couldn't be there for my sons, I at least want to see my grandchildren grow up.$1
Entries.Sat2: Jodi says Penny is a good girl...$0#$b#I haven't spoken with her that much, but I guess she is.$1
Entries.Sat10: Once in a while Penny comes to our house to have dinner.$1#$b#We have a good time, especially Sam and Vincent.$1
Entries.Sun8: Penny has helped me to get closer to Sam.$1#$b#...I'll be forever grateful to her for that.$1
Entries.Sun10: Seeing Sam dating Penny was surprising at first for Jodi and me.$0#$b#But now she's like our daughter too.$1

Entries.Mon4: Penny is a lovely girl.$1#$b#I'm glad Sam found someone like her.$1
Entries.Mon6: Yesterday I prayed to Yoba for happiness for Sam and Penny.$0
Entries.Tue8: It feels like just yesterday when Sam was a little baby.$0#$b#And now he's planning on getting married!$2
Entries.Wed4: I heard Sam talking with Penny earlier.$0#$e#I didn't know he could be so sweet!$1
Entries.Wed8: Penny truly is a good influence for both Vincent and Sam.$0
Entries.Thu8: Vincent told me that Sam was composing a song for Penny.$1#$b#Isn't it sweet?$1
Entries.Thu10: I've come to think of Penny as a member of our family.$1
Entries.Fri8: Do you think Sam and Penny will have kids someday?$0#$b#I don't know if he will be prepared...$2#$b#Well, I would love to help them.$1
Entries.Fri10: To be honest, I'm afraid of Sam moving away with Penny someday...$2
Entries.Sat2: Penny helped me with the garden yesterday.$1#$b#I wish Sam could learn something from her.$0
Entries.Sat10: We invited Penny to have dinner with us last night.$0#$b#I can see why Sam and Vincent like her so much.$0#$b#She even offered to help wash the dishes!$1
Entries.Sun8: Don't you think Sam and Penny are a really good couple?$1#$e#They might have different personalities, but they complement each other very well.$1
Entries.Sun10: To be honest with you, @...$0#$b#At first I wasn't sure about Penny and Sam, but now it makes me so happy to see them together.$0

Entries.PennySamWedding: I never imagined I'd get married so soon.$0#$b#Right now I'm on cloud nine!$4
Hello, @.$0#$e#The wedding was beautiful, don't you think?$0#$b#Sam and I were really nervous, but it all went great!$1
Mmm...$0#$b#If Miss Penny is married to my brother, does that mean I can't marry her anymore?$2

Oh, @, you can't even imagine how busy I was these weeks.$2#$b#I offered to help Sam and Penny plan their wedding, but I didn't know so many things had to be checked...$2#$e#My wedding with Kent was a lot simpler, only our closest relatives came.$0#$e#Well, I'm glad everything went smoothly.$0#$b#I've never seen Sam happier.$1
It was difficult to write the speech for Sam's wedding.$0#$b#I've never been good at these things.$0#$b#But I really wanted to tell Sam how I felt...$0#$e#I should get going now. Good day, @.$0
Guess my little girl will be moving in with Sam soon.$0#$b#Good thing is they said they ain't leaving the valley.$1
I don't have the opportunity to officiate many weddings, but I love to do so.$0#$b#It's good to see all these young people in love.$1
I always thought Sam wouldn't have the guts to propose to Penny.$0#$b#You know, he couldn't even ask her out first.$0#$e#But I'm happy for him. I just hope he doesn't forget about me!$1
I made a bet with Sebastian to see when Penny and Sam would tie the knot.$0#$b#I won!$1
It was wonderful to accompany Penny at her wedding.$0#$b#She even cried with joy before the ceremony started!$0
Miss Penny looked so beautiful at the wedding.$0#$b#I want to wear a wedding dress sometime too!$1
Jodi was so excited for the wedding of Penny and Sam.$0#$b#She couldn't stop talking about it!$1
I don't really know Penny, but her wedding dress was pretty.$0#$b#It really suited her.$0
Penny actually asked me for help to choose her wedding dress.$0#$b#I also made some alterations, the dress looked wonderful on her!$1
Pam stopped coming so often to the saloon when Penny started planning her wedding.$0#$b#She might not be the perfect mother, but she really cares for Penny.$0
Hello, dear.$0#$e#Marriage isn't always easy, Penny and Sam will have to overcome many difficulties together.$0#$b#May they become greater people together.$1
I talked to Penny and Sam after the wedding.$0#$b#They said they'd like to move in together soon.$0#$b#I'll gladly help them build their dream house.$1
I love weddings, they're so romantic.$0#$b#I hope Penny and Sam can live a long happy life together.$1

Ah... weddings...$0#$e#They remind me of this poem...$0#$e#'May you take on the world together with all your hopes and dreams$0#$b#May you be each other's sun and moon as your destinies unfold$0#$b#And should you lose sight of each other and start to drift apart$0#$b#May you circle back by following the compass of your hearts'$0
The key to a healthy marriage is communication, to share thoughts and feelings with each other.$0#$b#I hope Penny and Sam keep it in mind.$0
